text: Femme Fatale is a 2002 French erotic mystery thriller film directed by Brian De Palma. The film stars Rebecca Romijn and Antonio Banderas. It was screened out of competition at the 2002 Cannes Film Festival.The film was a box office bomb, but then the film overperformed in home video market in the United States,  and has since developed a cult status amongst cinephiles. Warner Bros had put the film in the catalogue of Warner Archive Collection.
